title: An Affair to Remember - looking to id font
content:
[http://www.imdb.com/media/rm532848384/tt0050105](http://web.archive.org/web/20080611163719/http:/www.imdb.com/media/rm532848384/tt0050105 "http://www.imdb.com/media/rm532848384/tt0050105")

What the Font was no help. Two different A’s but the other letters look the same so I think it is a font.

Your help will be appreciated.

Best,  
Linda

comments.content: This is a hand lettering job done by National Screen Service
